## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-108">ABA-routeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-109">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-110">negen cijfers met een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-111">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-112">twee cijfers in het bereik 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 of 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-113">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-114">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-115">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-116">een optioneel afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-117">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-118">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-119">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-120">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-121">Een beleid heeft het medium vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-122">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-123">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ABA_Routing gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-124">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-125">De functie Func_aba_routing inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-143">Argentinië national identity (DNI) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-144">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-145">Acht cijfers met of zonder perioden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-146">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-147">Acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-148">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-149">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-150">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-151">een optionele periode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-152">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-153">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-154">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-155">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-156">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-157">De normale expressie Regex_argentina_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-158">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_argentina_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-171">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-172">11 cijfers met streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-172">11 digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-173">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-174">11 cijfers met een streepje:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-174">11 digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-175">twee cijfers in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 of 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-176">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-177">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-178">een afbreekstreester (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-179">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-180">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-181">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-182">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-183">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-184">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-185">Er wordt een `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-186">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-187">Met de `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-226">Australië bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-227">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-228">zes tot tien cijfers met of zonder banknummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-228">six to 10 digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-229">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-230">Accountnummer is 6 tot 10 cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-231">Nummer van de australische bankstaat:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-232">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-233">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-234">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-235">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-236">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-237">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-238">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-239">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-240">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-241">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-242">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-243">De normale expressie Regex_australia_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-244">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_bank_account_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-274">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-275">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-276">een optioneel afbreekstreester of spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-285">Met de Func_australian_business_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-328">Australië rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-329">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-330">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-331">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-332">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-333">twee cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-334">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-335">vijf cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-336">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-337">een tot twee optionele letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-338">vier tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-339">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-340">negen cijfers of letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-341">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-342">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-343">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-344">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-345">De normale expressie Regex_australia_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-346">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-347">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-447">Nummer van medische rekening australië</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-448">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-449">10-11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-450">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-451">10-11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-452">Het eerste cijfer is in het bereik 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-453">Negende cijfer is een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-453">Ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-454">Tiende cijfer is het probleemcijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-455">Het elfde cijfer (optioneel) is het afzonderlijke getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-456">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-457">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-458">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-459">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-460">Met de Func_australian_medical_account_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-461">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-462">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-474">Australië paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-475">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-476">acht of negen alfanumerieke tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-477">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-478">één letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X), gevolgd door zeven cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by seven digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-479">Twee letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ), gevolgd door zeven cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-479">Two letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by seven digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-480">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-481">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-482">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-483">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-484">Met de normale `Regex_australia_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-485">Er wordt een `Keyword_australia_passport_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-486">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-487">Met de normale `Regex_australia_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-507">Australië belastingbestandsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-508">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-509">acht tot negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-510">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-511">acht tot negen cijfers die gewoonlijk spaties als volgt worden weergegeven:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-512">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-513">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-514">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-515">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-516">twee tot drie cijfers waarbij het laatste cijfer een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-517">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-518">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-519">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-520">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-521">De functie Func_australian_tax_file_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-522">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number of Keyword_number_exclusions gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-523">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-535">Oostenrijks rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-536">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-537">acht cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-538">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-539">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-540">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-541">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-542">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-543">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-544">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-545">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-672">Oostenrijk-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-673">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-674">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-675">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-676">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-677">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-678">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-679">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-680">Een combinatie van 24 tekens van letters, cijfers en speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-681">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-682">24 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-683">22 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes of plustekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-684">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig), cijfers, backslashes, slashes, plustekens of gelijktekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-685">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-686">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-687">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-688">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-689">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-690">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-691">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-693">identiteitsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-694">nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-696">Oostenrijks paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-697">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-698">Eén letter gevolgd door een optionele spatie en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-699">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-700">Een combinatie van één letter, zeven cijfers en één spatie:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-701">één letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-702">één spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-703">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-704">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-705">niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-706">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-707">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-708">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-709">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-710">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-711">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-712">Met de normale  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-713">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-737">Oostenrijks sociaal-zekerheidsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-738">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-739">10 cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-740">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-741">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-742">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-743">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-744">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-745">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-746">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-747">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-748">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-749">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-750">een trefwoord  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` uit wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-751">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-752">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-778">Oostenrijks btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-779">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-780">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-781">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-782">negen cijfers met optioneel afbreekstreester en schuine streep vooruit:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-783">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-784">een afbreekstreester (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-785">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-786">a forward slash (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-787">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-788">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-789">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-790">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-791">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-792">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-793">Er wordt een  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-794">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-795">Met de  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-796">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-796">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-797">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-797">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-798">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-798">österreich</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-799">st.nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-799">st.nr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-800">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-800">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-801">belasting-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-801">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-802">geen belastingidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-802">tax identification no</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-818">Oostenrijks belasting over toegevoegde waarde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-819">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-820">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-821">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-822">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-823">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-824">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-825">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-826">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-827">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-828">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-829">A of een</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-830">T of t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-831">Optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-832">U of u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-833">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-834">twee of drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-835">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-836">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-837">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-838">een of twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-839">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-840">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-841">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-842">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-843">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-844">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-845">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-846">Met de Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-864">Azure DocumentDB auth-toets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-865">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-866">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-867">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-868">De tekenreeks 'DocumentDb'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-869">Een combinatie van 3-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-870">Een groter dan symbool (>), een gelijkteken (=), een aanhalingsteken ("), of een apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-871">Elke combinatie van 86 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-872">Twee gelijke tekens (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-873">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-874">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-875">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-876">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-877">De normale expressie CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-878">In de CEP_CommonExampleKeywords wordt geen inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-879">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-879">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-881">(Technisch gezien identificeert dit type gevoelige informatie deze trefwoorden met behulp van een gewone expressie, niet met een trefwoordlijst.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-881">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-891">s-int.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-891">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-892">netto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-892">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-893">Azure IAAS-databaseverbindingsreeks en Azure SQL-verbindingsreeks</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-894">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-895">De tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron', gevolgd door de tekens en tekenreeksen die in het onderstaande patroon worden beschreven, inclusief de tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure..</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-896">com' of 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-897">net" of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-898">en de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord' of 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-899">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-900">de tekenreeks 'Server', 'server' of 'gegevensbron'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-901">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-902">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-903">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-904">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-905">De tekenreeks 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-906">com', 'cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-907">net", of "database.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-908">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-909">een combinatie van 1-300 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-910">de tekenreeks 'Wachtwoord', 'wachtwoord' of 'pwd'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-911">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-912">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-913">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-914">een of meer tekens die geen puntkomma (;), aanhalingsteken (") of apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-915">een puntkomma (;), aanhalingsteken (") of apostrof (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-916">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-917">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-918">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-919">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

```xml
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-946">de tekenreeks 'azure-devices'.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-947">netto"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-948">een combinatie van 1-200 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, symbolen, speciale tekens of spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-949">de tekenreeks 'SharedAccessKey'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-950">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-951">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-952">nul tot twee witruimtetekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-953">een combinatie van 43 kleine of hoofdletters, cijfers, slash (/) of plusteken (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-954">een gelijkteken (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
