## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3524">Nummer van Het Bureau voor drugshandhaving (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3524">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3525">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3525">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3526">twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3526">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3527">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3527">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3528">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3528">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3529">één letter (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) van deze set mogelijke letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, een registrantcode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3529">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3530">één letter (niet zaakgevoelig), de eerste letter van de achternaam of het cijfer '9' van de registrant</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3530">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3531">zeven cijfers, waarvan het laatste het controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3531">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3532">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3533">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3533">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3534">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3535">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3535">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3536">Met de Func_dea_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3536">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3537">Er wordt een `Keyword_dea_number` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3537">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3538">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3538">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3539">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3539">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3540">Met de Func_dea_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3540">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3541">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3541">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3542">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3542">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3543">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3544">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3544">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3545">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3545">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3546">beheer van drugshandhaving</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3546">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3547">instantie voor drugshandhaving</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3547">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3548">Estlands rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3548">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3549">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3550">twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3550">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3551">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3552">twee letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3552">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3553">de letters 'ET' (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3553">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3554">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3554">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3556">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3556">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3557">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3558">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3558">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3559">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3559">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3560">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3560">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3686">Estlandse persoonlijke identificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3686">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3687">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3687">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3688">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3688">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3689">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3689">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3690">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3690">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3691">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3691">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3692">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3692">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3693">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3694">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3694">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3695">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3696">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3696">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3697">een cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht en eeuw van geboorte (oneven getal man, even getal vrouw; 1-2: 19e eeuw; 3-4: 20e eeuw; 5-6: 21e eeuw)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3697">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3698">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3698">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3699">drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal dat personen scheidt die op dezelfde datum zijn geboren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3699">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3700">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3700">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3701">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3702">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3702">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3703">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3704">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3704">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3705">Met de  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3705">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3706">Er wordt een  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3706">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3707">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3707">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3708">Met de  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3708">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3741">Estlands paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3741">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3742">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3742">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3743">één letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3743">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3744">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3744">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3745">één letter gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3745">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3746">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3747">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3747">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3748">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3749">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3749">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3750">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3750">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3751">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3751">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3752">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3752">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3753">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3753">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3754">Met de normale  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3754">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3755">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3773">EU-betaalkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3773">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3774">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3774">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3775">16 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3775">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3776">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3776">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3777">Complex en robuust patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3777">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3778">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3778">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3779">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3779">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3780">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3780">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3781">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3781">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3782">Met de Func_eu_debit_card wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3782">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3783">Ten minste een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3783">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3784">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_eu_debit_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3784">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3785">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3785">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3786">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_security_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3786">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3787">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3787">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3788">Met de Func_expiration_date wordt een datum in de juiste datumnotatie gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3788">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-3789">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-3789">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4236">Finland-nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4236">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4237">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4238">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4238">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4239">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4240">10 cijfers met een afbreekstreester:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4240">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4241">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4241">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4242">een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4242">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4243">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4243">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4244">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4244">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4245">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4246">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4246">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4247">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4248">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4248">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4249">Met de normale  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4249">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4250">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4250">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4251">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4251">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4255">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4255">driverlicense</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4262">rijbewijzen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4262">driver licenses</span></span>

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4381">Finland European Health Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4381">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4382">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4382">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4383">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4383">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4384">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4384">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4385">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4385">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4386">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4386">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4387">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4387">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4388">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4389">20-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4389">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4390">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4391">20-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4391">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4392">10 cijfers - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4392">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4393">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4393">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4394">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4394">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4395">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4396">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4396">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4397">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4398">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4399">In de regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4399">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4400">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4400">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4418">Nationale finland-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4418">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4419">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4419">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4420">zes cijfers plus een teken dat een eeuw plus drie cijfers plus een vinkje aangeeft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4420">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4421">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4421">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4422">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4422">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4423">zes cijfers in de indeling DDMMYY, een geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4423">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4424">century marker ('-', '+' of 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4424">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4425">persoonlijk identificatienummer met drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4425">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4426">een cijfer of letter (case insensitive) dat een controlecijfer is</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4426">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4427">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4427">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4428">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4428">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4429">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4429">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4430">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4430">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4431">de functie Func_finnish_national_id inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4431">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4432">een trefwoord uit Keyword_finnish_national_id wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4432">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4433">de checksum passeert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4433">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4434">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4434">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4435">de functie Func_finnish_national_id inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4435">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4436">de checksum passeert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4436">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4485">Finland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4485">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4486">Deze entiteit is beschikbaar in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand gevoelige informatietype entiteit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4486">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4487">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4487">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4488">combinatie van negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4488">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4489">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4489">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4490">combinatie van negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4490">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4491">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4491">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4492">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4492">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4493">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4494">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4494">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4495">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4496">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4496">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4497">Met de normale `Regex_finland_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4497">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4498">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4498">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4499">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4499">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4500">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4501">Met de normale `Regex_finland_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4501">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4502">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_finland_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4502">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4503">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4503">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4526">Rijbewijsnummer van Frankrijk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4526">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4527">Deze entiteit is beschikbaar in het type gevoelige informatie over het EU-rijbewijsnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4527">This entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4528">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4528">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4529">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4529">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4530">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4530">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4531">12 cijfers met validatie om vergelijkbare patronen, zoals Franse telefoonnummers, te korting te geven</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4531">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4532">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4532">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4533">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4533">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4534">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4534">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4535">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4535">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4536">de functie Func_french_drivers_license inhoud vindt die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4536">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4537">een trefwoord uit Keyword_french_drivers_license wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4537">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4664">Frankrijk gezondheidsverzekeringsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4664">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4665">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4665">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4666">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4666">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4667">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4667">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4668">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4668">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4669">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4669">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4670">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4670">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4671">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4671">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4672">21-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4672">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4673">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4673">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4674">21-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4674">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4675">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4675">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4676">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4676">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4677">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4677">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4678">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4678">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4679">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4679">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4680">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4680">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4681">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4681">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4682">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4682">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4683">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4683">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4684">de regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4684">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4685">een trefwoord uit Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4685">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4686">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4686">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4687">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4688">verzekeringskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4688">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4689">carte vitaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4689">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4690">carte d'assuré sociaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4690">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4691">Franse nationale id-kaart (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4691">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4692">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4693">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4693">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4694">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4695">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4695">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4696">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4697">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4697">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4698">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4699">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4699">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4700">De normale expressie Regex_france_cni inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4700">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4701">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4701">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4703">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4703">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4704">kaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4704">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4707">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4707">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4708">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4708">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4709">compte banke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4709">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4710">nationaal identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4710">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4711">nationale identiteit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4711">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4712">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4712">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4713">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4713">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4715">Frankrijk paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4715">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4716">Deze entiteit is beschikbaar in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4716">This entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4717">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4717">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4718">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4719">negen cijfers en letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4719">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4720">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4721">negen cijfers en letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4721">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4722">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4722">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4723">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4723">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4724">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4724">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4725">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4725">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4726">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4726">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4727">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4727">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4728">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4728">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4729">Met de `Func_fr_passport` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4729">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4730">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4730">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4731">Met de normale `Regex_eu_passport_date3` expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling DD MM YYYY of wordt een trefwoord van `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4731">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4732">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4732">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4733">Met de `Func_fr_passport` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4733">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4734">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4734">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4735">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4735">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4736">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4736">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4737">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4737">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4738">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4738">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4739">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4739">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4740">paspoorten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4740">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4741">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4741">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4743">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4743">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4744">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4744">passport number</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4765">Frankrijkse socialezekerheidsnummer (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4765">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4766">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4767">15 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4767">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4768">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4769">Moet overeenkomen met een van de twee patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4769">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4770">13 cijfers gevolgd door een spatie gevolgd door twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4770">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4771">of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4771">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4772">15 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4772">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4773">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4774">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4774">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4775">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4776">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4776">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4777">Met de `Func_french_insee` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4777">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4778">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_fr_insee gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4778">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4779">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4780">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4780">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4781">Met de functie Func_french_insee of Func_fr_insee wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4781">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4782">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4782">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4813">Frankrijk btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4813">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4814">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4815">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4815">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4816">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4817">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4817">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4818">Eén cijfer dat 0, 1, 2 of 3 moet zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4818">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4819">Eén cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4819">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4820">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4820">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4821">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4821">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4822">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4822">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4823">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4823">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4824">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4824">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4825">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4825">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4826">Een spatie (optioneel)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4826">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4827">Drie controlecijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4827">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4828">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4829">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4830">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4831">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4831">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4832">Met de  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4832">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4833">Er wordt een  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4834">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4834">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4835">Met de  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4835">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4855">Frankrijk btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4855">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4856">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4856">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4857">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4857">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4858">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4858">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4859">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4859">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4860">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4860">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4861">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4861">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4862">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4863">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4863">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4864">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4865">Alfanumeriek patroon van 13 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4865">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4866">twee letters - FR (hoofdletters ongevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4866">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4867">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4867">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4868">twee letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4868">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4869">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4869">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4870">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4870">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4871">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4871">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4872">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4872">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4873">een optionele spatie, punt, afbreekstreester of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4873">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4874">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4874">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4875">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4875">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4876">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4876">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4877">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4877">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4878">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4878">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4879">Met de Func_france_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4879">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4880">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4880">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4881">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4881">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4882">Met de Func_france_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4882">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4895">Het rijbewijsnummer van Duitsland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4895">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4896">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-rijbewijsnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4896">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4897">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4897">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4898">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4899">combinatie van 11 cijfers en letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4899">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4900">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4901">11 cijfers en letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4901">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4902">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4902">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4903">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4903">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4904">zes cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4904">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4905">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4905">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4906">een cijfer of letter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4906">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4907">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4908">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4908">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4909">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4910">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4911">De functie Func_german_drivers_license inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4911">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4912">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_german_drivers_license_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4912">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-4913">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-4913">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
