## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5062">Duitsland-identiteitskaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5062">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5063">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5063">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5064">sinds 1 november 2010: Negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5064">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5065">van 1 april 1987 tot en met 31 oktober 2010: 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5065">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5066">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5067">sinds 1 november 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5067">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5068">één letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5068">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5069">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5069">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5070">van 1 april 1987 tot en met 31 oktober 2010:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5070">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5071">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5071">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5072">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5072">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5073">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5073">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5074">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5074">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5075">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5075">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5076">De normale expressie Regex_germany_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5076">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5077">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_germany_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5077">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5082">identificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5082">identification</span></span>

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5093">Duitsland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5093">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5094">Deze entiteit is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer en is beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand gevoelige informatietype entiteit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5094">This entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5095">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5096">10 cijfers of letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5096">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5097">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5098">Patroon moet de volgende gegevens bevatten:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5098">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5099">eerste teken is een cijfer of een letter uit deze set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5099">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5100">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5100">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5101">vijf cijfers of letters uit deze set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5101">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5102">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5102">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5103">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5104">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5104">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5105">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5106">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5106">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5107">De functie Func_german_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5107">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5108">Een trefwoord `Keyword_german_passport` van of `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5108">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5109">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5109">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5110">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5110">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5111">De functie Func_german_passport_data inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5111">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5112">Een trefwoord `Keyword_german_passport` van of `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5112">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5113">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5113">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5136">Btw-nummer duitsland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5136">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5137">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5137">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5138">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5138">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5139">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5139">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5140">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5140">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5141">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5141">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5142">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5142">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5143">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5143">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5144">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5144">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5145">Drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5145">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5146">Een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5146">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5147">Twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5147">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5148">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5148">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5149">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5150">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5150">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5151">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5152">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5152">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5153">Met de  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5153">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5154">Er wordt een  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5154">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5155">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5155">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5156">Met de  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5156">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5182">Duitsland btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5182">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5183">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5183">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5184">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5184">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5185">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5185">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5186">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5186">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5187">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5187">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5188">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5188">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5189">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5189">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5190">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5190">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5191">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5191">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5192">Alfanumeriek patroon van 11 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5192">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5193">een letter D of d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5193">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5194">een letter E of e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5194">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5195">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5195">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5196">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5196">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5197">een optionele spatie of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5197">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5198">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5198">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5199">een optionele spatie of komma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5199">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5200">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5200">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5201">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5202">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5203">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5204">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5205">De functie Func_germany_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5205">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5206">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5206">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5207">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5207">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5208">De functie Func_germany_value_added_tax_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5208">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5209">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5209">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5210">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5210">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5211">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5211">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5212">btw-nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5212">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5213">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5213">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5214">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5214">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5215">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5215">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5216">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5216">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5217">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5218">Licentienummer van Griekenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5218">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5219">Deze entiteit is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype Eu Driver's License Number.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5219">This entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5220">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5220">It is also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5221">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5222">negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5222">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5223">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5224">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5224">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5225">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5225">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5226">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5226">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5227">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5227">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5228">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5228">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5229">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5229">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5230">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5230">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5356">Nationale Griekenland-id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5356">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5357">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5357">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5358">Combinatie van 7-8 letters en cijfers plus een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5358">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5359">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5359">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5360">Zeven letters en cijfers (oude notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5360">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5361">Eén letter (een letter van het Griekse alfabet)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5361">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5362">Een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5362">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5363">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5363">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5364">Acht letters en cijfers (nieuwe notatie):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5364">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5365">Twee letters waarvan het hoofdletterteken voorkomt in zowel het Griekse als het Latijnse alfabet (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5365">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5366">Een streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5366">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5367">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5367">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5368">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5369">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5369">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5370">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5370">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5371">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5372">De normale expressie Regex_greece_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5372">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5373">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_greece_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5373">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5374">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5374">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5375">De normale expressie Regex_greece_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5375">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5376">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5376">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5377">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5378">Griekse id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5378">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5379">Griekse nationale id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5379">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5380">Griekse persoonlijke id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5380">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5381">Griekse politie-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5381">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5382">identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5382">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5383">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5383">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5384">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5384">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5385">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5385">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5386">Griekenland paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5386">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5387">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5388">Twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5388">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5389">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5390">Twee letters gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5390">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5391">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5392">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5393">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5394">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5395">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5395">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5396">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5397">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY (voorbeeld - 28 aug 19) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` gevonden van</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5397">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5398">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5399">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5399">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5400">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5410">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5410">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5411">paspoortnummers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5411">passportnumbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5413">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5414">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5414">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5415">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5415">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5416">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>


## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5417">Griekenland-nummer voor sociale zekerheid (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5417">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5418">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5419">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5420">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5421">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5422">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5423">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5424">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5425">11 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5425">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5426">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5426">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5427">Zes cijfers als geboortedatum YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5427">Six digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5428">Vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5428">Four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5429">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5429">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5430">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5431">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5431">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5432">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5433">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5433">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5434">Met de  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5434">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5435">Er wordt een  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5435">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5436">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5437">Met de  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5437">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5438">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5438">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5439">Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5440">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5440">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5441">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5441">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5442">sociale zekerheid nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5442">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5443">socialsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5443">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5444">sociaal-zekerheidsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5444">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5445">amka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5445">amka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5446">a.m.k.a.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5446">a.m.k.a.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5447">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5447">Αριθμού Μητρώου Κοινωνικής Ασφάλισης</span></span>


## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5448">Btw-nummer van Griekenland</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5448">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5449">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5449">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5450">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5450">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5451">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5451">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5452">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5452">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5453">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5453">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5454">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5454">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5455">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5456">Negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5456">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5457">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5458">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5458">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5459">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5460">Niet van toepassing</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5460">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5461">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5462">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5462">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5463">Met de normale  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5463">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5464">Er wordt een  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5464">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5493">Hongkong-identiteitskaartnummer (HKID)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5493">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5494">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5495">Combinatie van 8-9 letters en cijfers plus optionele haakjes rond het uiteindelijke teken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5495">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5496">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5497">Combinatie van 8-9 letters:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5497">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5498">1-2 letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5498">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5499">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5499">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5500">Het uiteindelijke teken (elk cijfer of de letter A), dat het controlecijfer is en optioneel tussen haakjes wordt omsloten.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5500">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5501">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5501">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5502">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5502">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5503">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5503">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5504">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5504">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5505">De functie Func_hong_kong_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5505">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5506">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_hong_kong_id_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5506">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5507">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5507">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5508">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5508">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5509">De functie Func_hong_kong_id_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5509">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5510">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5510">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5550">Rijbewijsnummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5550">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5551">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5551">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5552">Twee letters gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5552">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5553">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5553">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5554">Twee letters en zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5554">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5555">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5555">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5556">Zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5556">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5557">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5558">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5558">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5559">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5560">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5560">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5561">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5561">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5562">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5562">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5687">Persoonlijk identificatienummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5687">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5688">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5688">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5689">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5689">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5690">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5690">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5691">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5691">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5692">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5692">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5693">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5693">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5694">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5694">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5695">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5695">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5696">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5696">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5697">11 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5697">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5698">Eén cijfer dat overeenkomt met geslacht, 1 voor man, 2 voor vrouw.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5698">One digit that corresponds to gender, 1 for male, 2 for female.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5699">Andere getallen zijn ook mogelijk voor burgers die vóór 1900 zijn geboren of voor burgers met een dubbele nationaliteit.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5699">Other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5700">Zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5700">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5701">Drie cijfers die overeenkomen met een serieel getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5701">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5702">Eén vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5702">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5703">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5703">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5704">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5704">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5705">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5705">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5706">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5706">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5707">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5707">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5708">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5708">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5709">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5709">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5710">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5710">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5712">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5713">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5713">id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5716">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5716">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5717">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5717">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5718">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5718">sz.ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5721">Paspoortnummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5721">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5722">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5723">Twee letters gevolgd door zes of zeven cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5723">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5724">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5725">Twee letters gevolgd door zes of zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5725">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5726">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5726">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5727">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5727">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5728">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5728">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5729">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5729">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5730">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5730">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5731">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5731">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5732">Met de normale expressie wordt datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (Voorbeeld - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) of een trefwoord uit `Keywords_eu_passport_date` wordt gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5732">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5733">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5734">Met de normale  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5734">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5735">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5735">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5755">Hongarijese sociale zekerheidsnummer (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5755">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5756">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5757">Negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5757">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5758">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5759">Negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5759">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5760">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5761">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5761">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5762">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5763">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5763">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5764">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5764">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5765">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5765">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5766">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5766">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5767">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5773">hssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5773">hssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5774">socialsecuritynno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5774">socialsecuritynno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5780">sociale zekerheid nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5780">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5781">áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5781">áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5782">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5782">közösségi adószám</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5784">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5784">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5787">Btw-nummer van Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5787">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5788">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5788">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5789">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5789">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5790">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5790">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5791">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5791">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5792">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5792">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5793">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5793">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5794">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5794">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5795">10 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5795">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5796">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5796">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5797">10 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5797">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5798">Eén cijfer dat '8' moet zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5798">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5799">Acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5799">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5800">Eén vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5800">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5801">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5802">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5802">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5803">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5804">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5804">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5805">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5805">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5806">Er wordt een  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5806">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5807">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5808">Met de  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5834">Btw-nummer in Hongarije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5834">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5835">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5835">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5836">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5836">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5837">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5837">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5838">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5838">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5839">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5839">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5840">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5840">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5841">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5842">Alfanumeriek patroon van 10 tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5842">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5843">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5843">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5844">Alfanumeriek patroon van 10 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5844">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5845">twee letters - HU of hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5845">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5846">optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5846">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5847">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5847">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5848">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5849">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5849">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5850">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5851">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5851">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5852">Met de Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5852">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5853">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5853">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5854">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5854">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-5855">Met de Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
