## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8797">Polen-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8797">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8798">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8798">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8799">drie letters en zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8799">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8800">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8800">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8801">drie letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8801">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8802">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8802">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8803">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8803">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8804">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8804">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8805">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8805">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8806">De functie Func_polish_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8806">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8807">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8807">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8808">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8808">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8809">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8810">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8811">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8811">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8812">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8813">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8814">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8815">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8816">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8817">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8817">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8818">besturingssysteem.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8818">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8819">Nationale Polen-id (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8819">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8820">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8820">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8821">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8821">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8822">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8822">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8823">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum in de notatie YYMMDD vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8823">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8824">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8824">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8825">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8825">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8826">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8826">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8827">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8827">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8828">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8828">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8829">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8829">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8830">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8830">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8831">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_pesel_identification_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8831">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8832">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8832">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8833">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8833">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8834">Met de Func_pesel_identification_number wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8834">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8835">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8840">niepowtarzalny-numerieke waarde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8840">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8842">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8842">nr.-pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8847">Polen paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8847">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8848">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie is opgenomen in het gevoelige informatietype EU-paspoortnummer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8848">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8849">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8849">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8850">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8850">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8851">twee letters en zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8851">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8852">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8852">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8853">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8853">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8854">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8855">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8855">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8856">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8857">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8857">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8858">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8858">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8859">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8859">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8860">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8860">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8861">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8861">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8862">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8862">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8863">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8863">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8864">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8864">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8865">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8865">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8866">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8866">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8867">Met de `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8867">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8868">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8873">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8873">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8874">paspoorten</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8874">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8876">paspoort nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8876">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8879">paspoortnummers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8879">passportnumbers</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8894">Polen REGON-getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8894">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8895">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8895">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8896">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8896">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8897">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8897">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8898">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8898">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8899">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8899">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8900">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8900">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8901">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8901">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8902">9-cijferig of 14-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8902">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8903">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8903">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8904">negen cijfers of 14-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8904">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8905">negen cijfers of</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8905">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8906">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8906">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8907">afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8907">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8908">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8908">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8909">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8910">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8910">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8911">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8912">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8912">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8913">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8913">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8914">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_polish_regon_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8914">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8915">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8915">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8916">De functie Func_polish_regon_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8916">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8933">Btw-nummer polen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8933">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8934">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8934">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8935">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8935">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8936">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8936">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8937">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8937">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8938">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8938">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8939">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8939">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8940">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8940">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8941">11 cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8941">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8942">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8942">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8943">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8943">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8944">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8945">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8945">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8946">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8947">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8948">Met de  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8948">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8949">Er wordt een  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8949">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8979">Portugal burgerkaartnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8979">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8980">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8981">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8981">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8982">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8983">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8983">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8984">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8984">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8985">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8985">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8986">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8986">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8987">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8987">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8988">De normale expressie Regex_portugal_citizen_card inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8988">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8989">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_portugal_citizen_card gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8989">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8990">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8990">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_portugal_citizen_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8991">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8991">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8992">bilhete de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8992">bilhete de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8993">cartão de cidadão</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8993">cartão de cidadão</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8994">burgerkaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8994">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8995">documentnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8995">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-8996">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-8996">documento de identificação</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9009">Portugese nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9009">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9010">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9010">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9011">twee patronen: twee letters gevolgd door 5-8 cijfers met speciale tekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9011">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9012">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9012">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9013">Patroon 1: Twee letters gevolgd door 5/6 met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9013">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9014">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9014">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9015">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9015">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9016">Vijf of zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9016">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9017">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9017">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9018">Eén cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9018">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9019">Patroon 2: Een letter gevolgd door 6/8 cijfers met speciale tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9019">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9020">Eén letter (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9020">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9021">Een afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9021">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9022">Zes of acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9022">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9023">Een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9023">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9024">Eén cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9024">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9025">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9026">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9027">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9028">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9028">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9029">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9029">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9030">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9162">Portugal paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9162">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9163">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9164">één letter gevolgd door zes cijfers zonder spaties of scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9164">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9165">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9166">één letter gevolgd door zes cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9166">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9167">één letter (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9167">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9168">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9168">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9169">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9169">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9170">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9170">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9171">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9171">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9172">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9172">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9173">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9173">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9174">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9174">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9175">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de `Regex_eu_passport_date1` indeling DD.MM.YYYY of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` gevonden uit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9175">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9176">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9176">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9177">Met de normale  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9177">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9178">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9178">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9205">Portugese belastingidentificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9205">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9206">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9207">negen cijfers met optionele spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9207">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9208">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9208">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9209">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9209">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9210">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9210">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9211">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9211">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9212">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9212">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9213">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9213">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9214">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9215">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9215">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9216">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9217">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9217">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9218">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9218">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9219">Er wordt een  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9219">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9220">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9220">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9221">Met de  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9221">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9246">Roemenië rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9246">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9247">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9247">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9248">één teken gevolgd door acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9248">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9249">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9249">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9250">één teken gevolgd door acht cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9250">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9251">één letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9251">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9252">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9252">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9253">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9253">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9254">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9254">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9255">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9255">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9256">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9256">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9257">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9257">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9258">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9258">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9386">Roemeense persoonlijke numerieke code (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9386">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9387">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9388">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9389">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9390">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9391">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9392">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9393">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9394">13 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9394">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9395">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9395">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9396">één cijfer van 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9396">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9397">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum (YYMMDD) vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9397">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9398">twee cijfers, die 01-52 of 99 kunnen zijn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9398">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9399">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9399">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9400">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9401">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9402">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9403">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9403">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9404">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9404">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9405">Er wordt een  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9405">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9406">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9406">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9407">Met de  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9407">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9458">Roemenië paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9458">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9459">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9459">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9460">acht of negen cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9460">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9461">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9461">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9462">acht of negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9462">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9463">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9464">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9464">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9465">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9466">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9466">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9467">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9467">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9468">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9468">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9469">Met de normale expressie wordt de datum gevonden in de indeling `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (voorbeeld- 01 FEB/FEB 10) of wordt een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_date` uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9469">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9470">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9470">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9471">Met de normale  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9471">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9472">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9472">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9473">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9473">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9474">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9474">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9475">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9475">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9476">paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9476">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9477">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9477">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9490">Rusland paspoortnummer binnenlands</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9490">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9491">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9491">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9492">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9492">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9493">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9493">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9494">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9494">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9495">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9495">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9496">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9496">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9497">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9498">10-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9498">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9499">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9500">10-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9500">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9501">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9501">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9502">een optionele spatie of afbreekstreester</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9502">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9503">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9503">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9504">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9504">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9505">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9505">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9506">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9506">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9507">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9507">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9508">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9508">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9509">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9509">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9510">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9510">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9511">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9511">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9528">Rusland paspoortnummer internationaal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9528">Russia passport number international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9531">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9531">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9534">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9534">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9535">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9535">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9536">negencijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9536">nine-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9537">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9537">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9542">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9545">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9545">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9546">In de regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9546">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9547">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9547">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9564">Nationale id van Saudi-Arabië</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9564">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9565">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9566">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9566">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9567">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9568">10 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9568">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9569">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9570">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9570">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9571">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9572">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9572">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9573">De normale expressie Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9573">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9574">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9574">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9580">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9581">NRIC-nummer (National Registration Identity Card) van Singapore</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9581">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9582">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9582">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9583">negen letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9583">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9584">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9584">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9585">negen letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9585">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9586">de letter "F", "G", "S" of "T" (niet zaakgevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9586">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9587">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9587">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9588">een alfabetisch vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9588">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9589">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9589">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9590">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9590">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9591">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9591">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9592">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9592">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9593">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9593">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9594">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_singapore_nric gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9594">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9595">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9595">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9596">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9596">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9597">De normale expressie Regex_singapore_nric inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9597">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9598">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9598">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9599">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9599">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9600">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9600">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9601">Nationale registratie-identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9601">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9602">Nummer van een identiteitskaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9602">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9603">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9603">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9604">IC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9604">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9605">Buitenlands identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9605">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9606">FIN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9606">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9607">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9607">身份证</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9609">Slowakije-rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9609">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9610">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9610">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9611">één teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9611">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9612">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9612">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9613">één teken gevolgd door zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9613">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9614">één letter (niet case-sensitive) of cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9614">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9615">zeven cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9615">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9616">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9616">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9617">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9617">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9618">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9618">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9619">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9619">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9620">Met de normale  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` expressie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9620">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9621">Een trefwoord  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` van of `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9621">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9747">Persoonlijk nummer slowakije</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9747">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9748">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9748">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9749">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9749">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9750">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9750">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9751">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9751">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9752">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9752">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9753">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9753">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9754">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9755">negen of tien cijfers met optionele backslash</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9755">nine or 10 digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9756">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9756">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9757">zes cijfers die de geboortedatum vertegenwoordigen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9757">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9758">optionele slash (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9758">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9759">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9759">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9760">een optioneel vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9760">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9761">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9762">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9762">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9763">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9764">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9764">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9765">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9765">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9766">Er wordt een  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9766">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9767">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9767">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-9768">Met de  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-9768">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
