## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10786">Btw-nummer zweden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10786">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10787">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10787">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10788">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10788">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10789">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10789">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10790">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10790">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10791">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10791">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10792">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10792">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10793">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10793">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10794">10 cijfers en een symbool in het opgegeven patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10794">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10795">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10795">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10796">10 cijfers en een symbool:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10796">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10797">zes cijfers die overeenkomen met de geboortedatum (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10797">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10798">een plusteken of minteken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10798">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10799">drie cijfers die het identificatienummer uniek maken op de volgende plaatsen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10799">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10800">voor getallen die vóór 1990 zijn uitgegeven, wordt met het zevende en achtste cijfer het geboorteland of de in het buitenland geboren personen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10800">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10801">het cijfer in de negende positie geeft geslacht aan door oneven voor mannelijke of zelfs voor vrouwelijke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10801">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10802">een vinkje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10802">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10803">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10804">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10804">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10805">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10806">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10806">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10807">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10807">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10808">Er wordt een  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10808">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10809">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10809">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10810">Met de  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10810">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10836">SWIFT-code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10836">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10837">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10838">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10838">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10839">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10840">vier letters gevolgd door 5-31 letters of cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10840">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10841">bankcode met vier letters (niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10841">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10842">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10842">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10843">4-28 letters of cijfers (het basisrekeningnummer (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10843">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10844">een optionele spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10844">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10845">één tot drie letters of cijfers (rest van de BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10845">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10846">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10846">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10847">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10847">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10848">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10848">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10849">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10849">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10850">De normale expressie Regex_swift inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10850">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10851">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_swift gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10851">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10888">Zwitserland SSN AHV-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10888">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10889">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10889">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10890">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10890">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10891">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10891">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10892">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10892">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10893">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10893">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10894">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10894">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10895">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10896">13-cijferig getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10896">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10897">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10898">13-cijferig getal:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10898">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10899">drie cijfers - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10899">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10900">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10900">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10901">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10901">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10902">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10902">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10903">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10903">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10904">een optionele punt</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10904">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10905">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10905">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10906">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10907">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10907">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10908">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10909">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10909">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10910">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10910">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10911">Er wordt een trefwoord Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10911">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10912">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10912">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10913">Met de Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10913">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10934">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10935">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10936">één letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10936">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10937">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10938">een letter (in het Engels) gevolgd door negen cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10938">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10939">één letter (in het Engels, niet case-sensitive)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10939">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10940">het cijfer '1' of '2'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10940">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10941">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10941">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10942">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10942">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10943">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10943">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10944">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10944">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10945">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10945">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10946">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10946">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10947">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwanese_national_id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10947">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10948">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10949">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10949">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10950">Met de Func_taiwanese_national_id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10950">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10951">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10951">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10968">Taiwan paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10968">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10969">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10969">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10970">biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10970">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10971">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer: negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10971">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10972">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10972">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10973">biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10973">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10974">het teken '3'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10974">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10975">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10975">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10976">niet-biometrisch paspoortnummer:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10976">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10977">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10977">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10978">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10979">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10979">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10980">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10981">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10982">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10982">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10983">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_passport gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10983">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10987">Paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10987">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10988">Paspoort nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10988">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10989">Paspoortnum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10989">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10990">Paspoort #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10990">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10991">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10991">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10992">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10992">中華民國護照</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10994">Taiwan-ingezeten certificaatnummer (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10994">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10995">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10995">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10996">10 letters en cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10996">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10997">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10997">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10998">10 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10998">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-10999">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-10999">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11000">acht cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11000">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11001">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11002">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11002">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11003">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11004">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11005">De normale expressie Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11005">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11006">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11006">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11014">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11014">ARC</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11018">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11018">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11019">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11019">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11020">Thaise bevolkingsidentificatiecode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11020">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11021">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11022">13 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11022">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11023">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11024">13 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11024">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11025">eerste cijfer is geen nul of negen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11025">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11026">12 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11026">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11027">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11027">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11028">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11028">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11029">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11029">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11030">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11030">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11031">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11031">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11032">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11032">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11033">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11033">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11034">Met de Func_Thai_Citizen_Id wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11034">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11039">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11040">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11041">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11042">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11043">Turks nationaal identificatienummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11043">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11044">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11045">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11045">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11046">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11047">11 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11047">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11048">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11048">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11049">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11049">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11050">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11050">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11051">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11051">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11052">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11052">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11053">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Turkish_National_Id gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11053">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11054">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11054">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11055">De functie Func_Turkish_National_Id inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11055">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11056">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11056">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11057">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11062">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11062">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11063">rijbewijsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11063">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11064">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11064">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11065">Combinatie van 18 letters en cijfers in de opgegeven notatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11065">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11066">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11066">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11067">18 letters en cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11067">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11068">Vijf letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11068">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11069">Eén cijfer.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11069">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11070">Vijf cijfers in de datumnotatie MMDDY voor geboortedatum.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11070">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11071">Het zevende teken wordt verhoogd met 50 als het stuurprogramma een vrouw is. voor examen, 51 tot 62 in plaats van 01 tot 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11071">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11072">Twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) of het cijfer '9' in plaats van een letter.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11072">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11073">Vijf cijfers.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11073">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11074">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11074">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11075">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11075">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11076">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11076">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11077">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11077">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11078">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11078">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11079">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11079">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11080">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11080">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11081">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11081">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11082">Met de `Func_uk_drivers_license` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11082">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11083">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11083">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11204">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11204">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11205">kieslijstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11205">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11206">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11206">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11207">twee letters gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11207">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11208">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11208">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11209">twee letters (niet hoofdlettergevoelig) gevolgd door 1-4 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11209">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11210">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11210">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11211">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11211">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11212">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11212">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11213">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11214">De normale expressie Regex_uk_electoral inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11214">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11215">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_electoral gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11215">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11216">Trefwoorden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11216">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11217">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11218">raadsnominatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11218">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11219">formulier voor voordracht</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11219">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11220">kiesregister</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11220">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11221">kieslijst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11221">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11222">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11222">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11223">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11223">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11224">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11224">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11225">10-17 cijfers gescheiden door spaties</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11225">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11226">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11226">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11227">10-17 cijfers:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11227">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11228">3 of 10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11228">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11229">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11229">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11230">drie cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11231">een spatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11231">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11232">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11232">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11233">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11234">Ja</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11235">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11236">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11237">De functie Func_uk_nhs_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11237">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11238">Een van de volgende gegevens is waar:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11239">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11239">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11240">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11240">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11241">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11241">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11242">De checksum passeert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11244">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11244">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11250">patiënt-id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11250">patient id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11251">patiëntenidentificatie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11251">patient identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11252">patiënt nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11252">patient no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11253">patiëntnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11253">patient number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11254">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11254">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11255">HUISARTS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11255">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11256">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11256">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11257">D.O.B</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11257">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11258">Geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11258">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11259">Geboortedatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11259">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11260">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11260">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11261">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11262">Deze entiteit van het type gevoelige informatie maakt deel uit van het eu-nationale identificatienummer voor gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11263">Het is ook beschikbaar als een op zichzelf staand entiteit met gevoelige informatie.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11263">It's also available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11264">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11265">zeven tekens of negen tekens gescheiden door spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11265">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11266">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11267">twee mogelijke patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11267">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11268">twee letters (geldige NINOs gebruiken alleen bepaalde tekens in dit voorvoegsel, dat door dit patroon wordt gevalideerd; niet hoofdlettergevoelig)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11268">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11269">zes cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11269">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11270">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D' (net als het voorvoegsel zijn alleen bepaalde tekens toegestaan in het achtervoegsel; niet hoofd- en hoofdschruf)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11270">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11271">OF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11271">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11272">twee letters</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11272">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11273">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11273">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11274">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11274">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11275">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11275">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11276">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11276">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11277">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11277">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11278">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11278">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11279">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11279">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11280">'A', 'B', 'C' of 'D'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11280">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11281">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11282">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11282">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11283">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11284">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11284">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11285">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11285">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11286">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_uk_nino gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11286">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11287">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11287">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11288">De functie Func_uk_nino inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11288">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11310">VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11310">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11311">Uniek referentienummer voor belastingbetalers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11311">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11312">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11312">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11313">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11313">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11314">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11314">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11315">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11315">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11316">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11316">records management</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11318">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11318">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11319">10 cijfers zonder spaties en scheidingstekens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11319">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11320">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11320">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11321">10 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11321">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11323">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11323">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11324">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11325">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11326">Met de  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` functie wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11326">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11327">Er wordt een  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trefwoord uit gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11327">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11347">Amerikaans bankrekeningnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11347">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11348">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11348">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11349">6-17 cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11349">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11350">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11350">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11351">6-17 opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11351">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11352">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11352">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11353">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11353">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11354">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11354">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11355">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11355">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11356">De normale expressie Regex_usa_bank_account_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11356">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11357">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_usa_Bank_Account gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11357">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11387">Amerikaans nummer van het rijbewijs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11387">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11388">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11388">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11389">Is afhankelijk van de status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11389">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11390">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11390">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11391">is afhankelijk van de staat, bijvoorbeeld New York:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11391">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11392">negen cijfers die zijn opgemaakt, zoals ddd ddd ddd, komen overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11392">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11393">negen cijfers zoals ddddddddd komen niet overeen.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11393">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11394">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11395">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11395">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11396">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11397">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11397">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11398">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11398">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11399">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11399">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11400">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11400">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11401">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11401">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11402">De functie Func_new_york_drivers_license_number inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11402">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11403">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11403">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11404">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11404">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11405">Er wordt geen trefwoord Keyword_us_drivers_license gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11405">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11503">Amerikaans individueel nummer voor het identificeren van belastingbetalers (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11503">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11504">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11505">negen cijfers die beginnen met een '9' en een '7' of '8' bevatten als het vierde cijfer, eventueel opgemaakt met spaties of streepjes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11505">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11506">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11507">opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11507">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11508">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11508">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11509">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11509">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11510">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11510">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11511">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11511">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11512">een cijfer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11512">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11513">een spatie of streepje</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11513">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11514">vier cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11514">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11515">niet-opgemaakt:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11515">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11516">het cijfer '9'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11516">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11517">twee cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11517">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11518">een '7' of '8'</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11518">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11519">vijf cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11519">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11520">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11520">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11521">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11521">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11522">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11522">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11523">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11523">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11524">Met de Func_formatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11524">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11525">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11525">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11526">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11526">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11527">Met de Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11527">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11528">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_itin gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11528">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11529">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11530">Met de functie Func_formatted_itin of Func_unformatted_itin wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11530">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11541">belastingbetaler</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11541">tax payer</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11545">Amerikaans sociaal-zekerheidsnummer (SSN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11545">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11546">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11546">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11547">negen cijfers, die zich mogelijk in een opgemaakt of niet-opgemaakt patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11547">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11548">Als een SSN vóór medio 2011 is uitgegeven, heeft een SSN een sterke opmaak waarbij bepaalde delen van het getal binnen bepaalde bereik moeten vallen om geldig te zijn (maar er is geen checksum).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11548">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11549">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11549">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11550">Vier functies zoeken naar SSN's in vier verschillende patronen:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11550">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11551">Func_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vóór 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-ddddd OR ddd ddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11551">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn vindt SSN's met een sterke opmaak van vóór 2011 die niet is opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11552">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn zoekt naar SSN's na 2011 die zijn opgemaakt met streepjes of spaties (ddd-dd-dddd OF ddd dd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11553">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn wordt na 2011 SSN's gevonden die niet zijn opgemaakt als negen opeenvolgende cijfers (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11554">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11555">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11555">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11556">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11556">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11557">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11557">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11558">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11558">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11559">De functie Func_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11559">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11560">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11560">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11561">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11561">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11562">Met de Func_unformatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11562">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11563">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11563">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11564">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11564">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11565">Met de Func_randomized_formatted_ssn wordt inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11565">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11566">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11566">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11567">Een DLP-beleid heeft weinig vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11567">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11568">De functie Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11568">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11569">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_ssn gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11569">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```
