## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11584">V.S. / VK</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11584">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11585">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11585">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11586">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11587">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11587">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11588">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11589">negen opeenvolgende cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11589">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11590">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11590">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11591">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11591">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11592">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11592">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11593">Een DLP-beleid heeft er veel vertrouwen in dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11593">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11594">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11594">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11595">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11595">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11596">Er wordt een `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trefwoord uit gevonden</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11596">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11597">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11597">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11598">De functie Func_usa_uk_passport inhoud die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11598">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11599">Een trefwoord `Keywords_eu_passport_number` van of `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` wordt gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11599">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11615">Oekraïne paspoort binnenlands</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11615">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11616">Dit type gevoelige informatie is alleen beschikbaar voor gebruik in:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11616">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11617">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11617">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11618">beleid voor communicatie compliance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11618">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11619">informatiebeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11619">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11620">recordbeheer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11620">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11621">Beveiliging van microsoft-cloud-apps</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11621">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11622">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11622">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11623">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11624">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11624">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11625">negen cijfers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11625">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11626">Checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11627">Nee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11627">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11628">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11629">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11629">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11630">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11630">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11631">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11631">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11642">preventiebeleid voor gegevensverlies</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11642">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11647">Opmaak</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11647">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11649">Patroon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11649">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11650">alfanumeriek patroon met acht tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11650">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11655">Definitie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11656">Een DLP-beleid heeft een gemiddeld vertrouwen dat dit type gevoelige informatie is gedetecteerd als dit binnen een nabijheid van 300 tekens:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11656">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11657">In de regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International inhoud gevonden die overeenkomt met het patroon.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11657">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="07ebd-11658">Er wordt een trefwoord Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International gevonden.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="07ebd-11658">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
